import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import PartTimeItem from "../components/PartTimeItem"; import FullTimeItem from "../components/FullTimeItem"; import RecentJobItem from "../components/RecentJobItem"; import { jobs } from "../data"; export default function HomeJobs() { const [partJobs, setPartjobs] = useState([]); const [fullJobs, setFulljobs] = useState([]); useEffect(() =>{ setPartjobs(jobs.filter((item) => item.nature == "Part-Time")); setFulljobs(jobs.filter((item) => item.nature == "Full-Time")); }, [jobs]) console.log(partJobs); console.log(fullJobs); return (
